description: Try our easy to follow Baked Salmon With Zucchini Spaghetti recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fish dishes,Pescatarian,Roast,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Broccolini,Zucchini,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Tomato,Dairy free,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Baked Salmon With Zucchini Spaghetti Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Place 11/2 tbs of the oil into a roasting pan. Place into oven and heat for 5 minutes. Add garlic, leek, fennel and zucchini to pan and toss well to coat with oil. Season with salt and pepper. Bake for 5 minutes.

Slice lemon. Season salmon to taste. Sprinkle with thyme and top with lemon slices. Arrange salmon on top of vegetables. Drizzle with remaining oil. Bake for 10 minutes. Add tomatoes to roasting pan. Bake for a further 5 minutes until fish is cooked to your liking and tomatoes are just soft.
Meanwhile, place snow peas and broccolini into a bowl. Pour over boiling water and set aside for 5 minutes until tender. Drain. Serve fish with snow peas, broccolini and tomato.
